name: Rainbow Kuriboh
description:
You can only use each effect of "Rainbow Kuriboh" once per turn.
â— When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can target that attacking monster; equip this card from your hand to that monster. It cannot attack.
â— When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack while this card is in your Graveyard: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field.
